name: OpenWebUIChat
short: Ultimate AI Assistant with Modern UI & Advanced Features
description: The most advanced AI assistant for Discord with OpenWebUI integration. Features modern UI with embeds, buttons, modals, slash commands, auto-responses, conversation memory, rate limiting, and much more!
author: Geri
install_msg: ðŸš€ OpenWebUIChat loaded! The ultimate AI assistant is ready. Use `/ai setup` for quick configuration or `/chat` to start chatting!
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores OpenWebUI API keys globally, conversation history per guild, and user preferences. All data is stored locally and can be deleted using the provided admin commands.
